title: ------MASSIVE 4 BED-2 BATH W/ 2 BALCONIES ----PRIME ASTORIA------
posting_body: ['------MASSIVE 4 BED-2 BATH W/ 2 BALCONIES ----PRIME ASTORIA------', 'Listing ID #: 212994', 'Price: $4,499', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 4.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,200 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Floor: 3', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Balcony', 'City View', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'Open View', 'Outdoor Space', 'Park View', 'Private Deck', 'Renovated', 'River View', 'Walk In Closet', 'Massive 4 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment with 2 balconies available for rent in the heart of Astoria! - 3 king sized bedrooms and 1 full sized bedroom as well as 2 full bathrooms - Huge living area with enough space for plenty of furniture as well as a balcony - Dining area adjacent from an eat in kitchen - Brand new stove, new fridge to be installed soon, Also dishwasher hookup available - Tenant pays heat, gas, and electric - 1 minute walk from all your cafes restaurants supermarkets and other commercial stores on Broadway - 3 minute walk to the N/W train station located on Broadway to get to midtown in under 10 minutes', 'This will not last… To schedule a viewing contact Shah at 646-717-1832 or email at <URL>', 'Shahriar Alom', 'Phone: 718-685-2775', 'Mobile: 646-717-1832', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 718-685-2775 \xa0 646-717-1832 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Shahriar Alom at 646-717-1832']
